name: Betterteem
description: Betterteem AI® is a platform that monitors employee experience. Using its algorithm, it serves as an early warning tool for unwanted employee resignations, enabling business operations leaders to take steps to prevent potential disruptions to their service delivery.
Headline: We are your early warning tool for unwanted employee resignations.
ShortDescription: Betterteem AI® gets into employees' sentiments to help leaders improve talent engagement and retention.

Highlights.name: Perks and Play
Highlights.description: Boost team morale with Betterteem Perks by giving your employees access to exclusive discounts on top products and services, from clothing to travel, to enhance the employee experience.

Highlights.name: Check-in
Highlights.description: Help team managers promote accountability and growth with Check-In. Empower people leaders to monitor progress, record development plans, and provide assistance for career advancement.

Highlights.name: Mission
Highlights.description: Help team managers promote accountability and growth with a Check-In tool that is built to monitor progress, record development plans, and provide assistance for career advancement.

enhanced_description: Betterteem AI® is an AI-powered platform designed as an early warning tool for unwanted employee resignations. It monitors employee experience and sentiment, leveraging its algorithm to help business operations leaders prevent potential disruptions to service delivery by improving talent engagement and retention. The platform features 'Perks and Play' to boost team morale through exclusive discounts on products and services, and a 'Check-in' tool that empowers team managers to monitor employee progress, record development plans, and provide assistance for career advancement.
key_use_cases: Predicting and preventing unwanted employee resignations
Boosting employee morale through rewards and recognition programs
Facilitating manager-employee check-ins for progress and development monitoring
competitive_advantages: AI-powered early warning system for employee resignations
Focus on employee sentiment analysis for deeper insights
Integration of rewards & recognition with retention strategies
roi_benefits: Prevention of service delivery disruptions due to resignations
Data-driven insights for leaders to improve talent management
Empowerment of people leaders to promote accountability and growth
